channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Airline passenger refuses to leave exit row after claiming he had knee injury for priority boarding

item.description: Biden's most recent climate initiatives are all but certain to be short-lived, mostly thanks to an obscure law that tends to come into play every four...

item.title: Thousands of Jews have left Israel since the October 7 attacks
item.description: There's concern about whether emigration after Oct. 7, 2023 will drive a "brain drain" in sectors like medicine and tech.

item.title: Russian missiles target Kyiv after Ukraine fires US-made missiles across the border

item.description: A journalists' association says two journalists working for Kurdish media outlets were killed in Syria while covering fighting between Turkish-backed ...

item.title: Official says Wisconsin shooter was new student at Christian school where her victims had deep ties
item.description: An official at the Wisconsin school where a student shot and killed a teacher and a fellow student says the 15-year-old was in her first semester ther...

item.title: 1 dead in 'brutal' Russian missile attack on Kyiv, US ambassador says
item.description: A Russian missile strike killed one person and wounded seven others early on Friday morning, Ukraine's Ministry of Defense said.

item.title: Crypto Market Sees $1.2 Billion in Liquidations as Bitcoin, Dogecoin, XRP and Solana Face Double-Digit Losses
Government shutdown live updates: Trump calls for Congress to 'get rid of' ceiling
item.description: The federal government is set to run out of money Friday night.

item.title: WATCH: 3rd grader caught on camera saving choking student
item.description: Thomas Conley, 8, jumped into action when he noticed his classmate was choking in their school cafeteria.

item.title: 'Catastrophic event': What the US defaulting on its debt could mean
item.description: The reality is that a U.S. government default would be unprecedented, and many experts have said it would likely lead to economic chaos.

item.title: News details emerge about Utah mom, 3 kids killed at their home
item.description: One child survived being shot in the head and is hospitalized with a severe brain injury, police said.

item.title: Croatian police say a 7-year-old girl died, 6 people wounded in school knife attack
item.description: Authorities say a 7-year-old girl has died and a teacher and five other students were wounded in a knife attack at a school in the Croatian capital, Z...

item.title: Stuffing stockings with skincare? Here's what kids should and shouldn't be using
item.description: Skin care is all the rage​ for teens and tweens these days, but be careful not to give products that could cause more harm than good.
